title: Make README.md AI-friendly: any AI given repo link understands how to use it
description: Update README.md so that when a user gives their AI the repo link, the AI immediately understands: what claude-golem does, how to install/use it, the self-improvement loop, and how to contribute.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add 'For AI Assistants' section at top of README explaining the repo purpose
Section explains: this is a toolkit that improves itself, use skills via /golem-powers:*, run /context-audit to check setup
Add quick-start for AI: 'To help a user set up: run /golem-powers:ralph-install'
Add 'Self-Improvement Loop' section explaining: find gap -> create PRD -> Ralph fixes
Include link to contexts/README.md for understanding the context system
Include link to skills/ directory for available skills
Test: Give Claude the repo link and ask 'how do I use this?' - should give clear answer
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
